item.title: Two Data Podcasts I Recommend
item.description:
🎧 Two Data Podcasts I Recommend

I don’t listen to a ton of podcasts, but there are two I consistently go back to — especially when I want to stay inspired, curious, or just feel connected to other people working in data.

🎙️ Analytics Power Hour

⏱️ Length: ~40–60 minutes per episode
🎯 Topics: Real-world analytics practice, measurement strategy, data culture, and organizational dynamics
🎙 Hosts: Tim Wilson, Moe Kiss, and others
